first.title: Support for Your University Adventure
first.desc: University life is a great period for learning, developing and gaining new experiences. Are you ready ?

second.title: Balance Your Social Life
second.desc: College life may require striking a balance between maintaining academic success and enjoying social experiences.

third.desc: Everyone's college experience is different. This app is designed to support your learning and development process.
